abstract.text: An object that provides forward and inverse discrete Fourier transforms on single- or double-precision collections of interleaved or split-complex data.

abstract.text: Make large-scale mathematical computations and image calculations, optimized for high performance and low energy consumption.
A structure that represents a single-precision complex value.
A structure that represents a double-precision complex value.
An enumeration that acts as a namespace for Swift overlays to vDSP.
A single- and double-precision discrete Fourier transform.
Discrete Fourier transform types.
An object that provides forward and inverse discrete Fourier transforms on single- or double-precision collections of interleaved or split-complex data.
Returns a new discrete Fourier transform instance.
Returns the result of a double-precision discrete Fourier transform.
Returns the result of a single-precision discrete Fourier transform.
Computes a single-precision discrete Fourier transform.
Computes a double-precision discrete Fourier transform.
Computes a double-precision discrete Fourier transform.
Computes a single-precision discrete Fourier transform.
Returns the result of a single-precision discrete Fourier transform.
Returns the result of a double-precision discrete Fourier transform.
Optimize discrete Fourier transform (DFT) performance with the vDSP interleaved DFT routines.
